thread.title: Episode 36: Life at the Back of the Pack
thread.title_full: Episode 36: Life at the Back of the Pack

author: bdalek1
title: Episode 36: Life at the Back of the Pack
text:
Episode 36: Life at the Back of the Pack The positive spirit of the Sub-30 Club; Ted Spiker on leading the from the back. By Christine Fennessy , Brian Dalek Thursday, January 12, 2017, 8:06 am Writer and Sub-30 Club founder Ted Spiker shares how he is so amazed that his simple goal of breaking 30 minutes in a 5K turned into one of the most postive running groups around. Plus, his longtime struggle with weight, and what life is like at the back of the pack. (2:34) The amazing motivational power behind the Sub-30 Club , a group that doesn’t leave any runner behind. (42:37) In the Kick, some cool new fitness tech from CES 2017, notable announcements from the elite side, and a man with paraplegia walks the Dopey Challenge. (1:01:58) 
The Runner’s World Show is brought to you by Aaptiv , an on-demand audio fitness app that you can do at home, at the gym, outdoors—anywhere. Get your first month free when you sign up for a monthly subscription at aaptiv.com and use the promo code “RUN.” Advertisement
